description: Manage vector databases, store embeddings, and perform similarity searches

actions.name: create_index
actions.description: Creates a new Pinecone index with custom settings.

actions.name: delete_vector
actions.description: Delete vectors by ID from a namespace.

actions.name: get_vector
actions.description: Look up and return vectors by ID from a namespace.

actions.name: search_index
actions.description: Search indexes by name or list all indexes in your project.

actions.name: search_vector
actions.description: Search a namespace using a query vector to find similar records.

actions.name: update_vector
actions.description: Updates a vector in a namespace. Overwrites existing values and metadata.

actions.name: upsert_vector
actions.description: Upsert vectors into a namespace. Overwrites existing vectors with the same ID.
